property.name: fs.gs.project.id
property.description: Required. Google Cloud Project ID with access to configured GCS buckets.

property.name: fs.gs.working.dir
property.description: The directory relative gs: uris resolve in inside of the default bucket.

property.name: fs.gs.implicit.dir.repair.enable
property.description: Whether or not to create objects for the parent directories of objects with / in their path e.g. creating gs://bucket/foo/ upon finding gs://bucket/foo/bar.

property.name: fs.gs.glob.flatlist.enable
property.description: Whether or not to prepopulate potential glob matches in a single list request to minimize calls to GCS in nested glob cases.

property.name: fs.gs.copy.with.rewrite.enable
property.description: Whether or not to perform copy operation using Rewrite requests. Allows to copy files between different locations and storage classes.

property.name: fs.gs.system.bucket
property.description: Deprecated. GCS bucket to use as a default bucket if fs.default.name is not a gs: uri.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.access.token.provider.impl
property.description: The implementation of the AccessTokenProvider interface used for GCS Connector.

property.name: mapred.bq.auth.access.token.provider.impl
property.description: The implementation of the AccessTokenProvider interface used for BigQuery Connector.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.service.account.enable
property.description: Whether to use a service account for GCS authorization. If an email and keyfile are provided (see fs.gs.auth.service.account.email and fs.gs.auth.service.account.keyfile), then that service account will be used. Otherwise the connector will look to see if it is running on a GCE VM with some level of GCS access in it's service account scope, and use that service account.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.service.account.email
property.description: The email address is associated with the service account used for GCS access when fs.gs.auth.service.account.enable is true. Required when authentication key specified in the Configuration file (Method 1) or a PKCS12 certificate (Method 3) is being used.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.service.account.private.key.id
property.description: The private key id associated with the service account used for GCS access. This can be extracted from the json keyfile generated via the Google Cloud Console.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.service.account.private.key
property.description: The private key associated with the service account used for GCS access. This can be extracted from the json keyfile generated via the Google Cloud Console.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.service.account.json.keyfile
property.description: The path to the json keyfile for the service account.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.service.account.keyfile
property.description: The PKCS12 (p12) certificate file of the service account used for GCS access when fs.gs.auth.service.account.enable is true.

property.name: fs.gs.auth.client.id
property.description: The client ID for GCS access in the OAuth 2.0 installed application flow (when fs.gs.auth.service.account.enable is false).

property.name: fs.gs.auth.client.secret
property.description: The client secret for GCS access in the OAuth 2.0 installed application flow (when fs.gs.auth.service.account.enable is false).

property.name: fs.gs.auth.client.file
property.description: The client credential file for GCS access in the OAuth 2.0 installed application flow (when fs.gs.auth.service.account.enable is false).

property.name: fs.gs.http.max.retry
property.description: The maximum number of retries for low-level HTTP requests to GCS when server errors (code: 5XX) or I/O errors are encountered.

property.name: fs.gs.http.connect-timeout
property.description: Timeout in milliseconds to establish a connection. Use 0 for an infinite timeout.

property.name: fs.gs.http.read-timeout
property.description: Timeout in milliseconds to read from an established connection. Use 0 for an infinite timeout.

property.name: fs.gs.block.size
property.description: The reported block size of the file system. This does not change any behavior of the connector or the underlying GCS objects. However it will affect the number of splits Hadoop MapReduce uses for a given input.

property.name: fs.gs.inputstream.buffer.size
property.description: The number of bytes in read buffers.

property.name: fs.gs.outputstream.upload.chunk.size
property.description: The number of bytes in one GCS upload request.

property.name: fs.gs.file.size.limit.250gb
property.description: Whether to limit files to 250 GB. Setting to false may degrade connector performance somewhat.

property.name: fs.gs.marker.file.pattern
property.description: If set, files that match specified pattern are copied last during folder rename operation.

property.name: fs.gs.requester.pays.mode
fs.gs.requester.pays.project.id
property.description: Optional. Google Cloud Project ID that will be used for billing when GCS Requester Pays feature is active (in AUTO, CUSTOM or ENABLED mode). If not specified and GCS Requester Pays is active then value of the `fs.gs.project.id` property will be used.

property.name: fs.gs.requester.pays.buckets
property.description: Optional. Comma-separated list of Google Cloud Storage Buckets for which GCS Requester Pays feature should be activated if `fs.gs.requester.pays.mode` property value is set to CUSTOM.

property.name: fs.gs.config.override.file
property.description: Optional. Override configuration file path. Properties defined in this file overrides the properties defined in core-site.xml and values passed from command line.
